title: Duchess Meklen’s Elegant Revolt - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Nobles   Royalty   Second Chance   Time Travel
author: 우주케이크
description:
Eleanor, who lacked the love she needed since birth, lost everything in an instant as a princess.

A political marriage with the Duke of another country that was forced upon her.

The last thing she wanted was to live as a duchess in vain and die a miserable death.

Miraculously, she went back to the past and swore that she won’t live like a fool again.

As she constantly seeks an opportunity to turn the tables, will her rebellion succeed?
>
